ygData.subject: Re: Bow advice
ygData.msgSnippet: I was gifted with a Hunting Bow and some arrows, then taught how to use them. I then read about fletching kits and such, and finally found one. I ve started
ygData.messageBody:
I was gifted with a Hunting Bow and some arrows,
then taught how to use them. I then read about
fletching kits and such, and finally found one. I've
started making my own arrows, and successfully made a
rough oak bow with a hemp string the first try. You can
buy bows and arrows at fletchers shops in Kelethin (2
shops, and one outside merchant). Buy a fletching kit,
then make your own stuff, it s cheaper. Check out the
files on the Allakazam site for some REAL good
info.<br><br>Alfric<br>4th Lvl Ranger<br>Kelethin<br>The Nameless
